subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Having learned proper form from his mother, the 6-foot-7 Wragge enters Creighton’s first Big East tournament as the most dangerous 3-point shooter in the conference.
snippet: Having learned proper form from his mother, the 6-foot-7 Wragge enters Creighton’s first Big East tournament as the most dangerous 3-point shooter in the conference.
